Aaron McKie had 19 points and George Karl Lynch added 16 for Philadelphia, which finished as the top team in the East for the first time since 1983-84. Richard Hamilton scored 24 points and Allen Iverson added 23 as the Pistons won for the second straight time to open their four-game road trip after losing their first two games with Allen Iverson .
